mapper.select: select post.postUUID, post.createTime, post.postTab, post.postTitle, post.postContent, student.stuUUID, student.stuName, student.stuHeadImg from (select postUUID, stuUUID, createTime, postTab, postTitle, postContent from tb_post) post inner join tb_student student on post.stuUUID = student.stuUUID order by post.createTime desc

select post.postUUID, post.createTime, post.postTab, post.postTitle, post.postContent, student.stuUUID, student.stuName, student.stuHeadImg from (select postUUID, stuUUID, createTime, postTab, postTitle, postContent from tb_post where postTab = #{tabID}) post inner join tb_student student on post.stuUUID = student.stuUUID order by post.createTime desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_post (postUUID, postTab, stuUUID, createTime, postTitle, postContent) VALUES(#{postUUID}, #{postTab}, #{stuUUID}, NOW(), #{postTitle}, #{postContent});
mapper.select: select post.postUUID, post.createTime, post.postTitle, post.postContent, student.stuUUID, student.stuName, student.stuHeadImg from (select postUUID, stuUUID, createTime, postTitle, postContent from tb_post where postUUID = #{postUUID}) post inner join tb_student student on post.stuUUID = student.stuUUID
